title: AMA about me

replies.body: Idrk you too well my mans, sorry. I might know you, but I don’t remember.

replies.body: Hey Josh, what have you been up to since leaving Avicus? You and your brother going to pop in for the last few days?

replies.body: School, surfing, just living life man. I popped on a lil while ago with some older school guys but no chance garrett will.
